name: Geometry Merge
description:
This little puzzle game is all about merging blocks (and not running out of space and steps...)!
Control one block at a time and try to match it with a similar block, without using up all of your moves. Only similar blocks can pass through each other, so plan carefully!

If you merge a block 3 times, it disappears and gives you extra steps plus lots of juicy points.
Reach for the highest score possible!

This game was originally made for the Ludum Dare 42 game jam.
